conversation.content: Hey, uh, are you the healer that just joined? Level 47?
Yeah that's me. Been playing healer for about three years now, same rotation, same dungeons, same complaints from tanks who don't use cooldowns.
[cough] Wait, you were DarkBladeMaster? The guy who soloed the Crimson Tower?
That was me. Back when I actually cared about leaderboards and optimal rotations and all that. These days I just queue up, keep everyone alive, collect my tokens.
So you think healing is just... easier queue times?
It's instant queues and less effort honestly. Stand in the back, press three buttons in sequence, occasionally move out of the fire. I could do it in my sleep at this point.
Fair point. What server did you transfer from?
Shadowmere East. Dead server, dead economy, dead guilds. Everyone left after the drama, I just stuck around longer than I should have because moving seemed like too much work.
Oh man, THAT server. You survived the exodus?
[cough] Survived is generous. More like I logged in one day and realized I was basically playing a single-player game. Even the gold farmers had given up on us.
Quick question before we startâ€”you know the mechanics for Thornwood Sanctuary right?
[deep pitch] Stand here, move there, dispel the thing, don't stand in the bad. I've run it probably two hundred times. Could heal it with my eyes closed honestly.
Good enough. You have voice chat?
Got a headset but I don't really talk much. I'll listen to callouts but don't expect much commentary from me. Not really the cheerleader type.
At least you upgraded. Half our guild still complains about frame drops.
[upset] Yeah well, when you've been playing the same game for six years you either upgrade or quit. I chose the path of least resistance.
Speaking of which, what's your healing addon setup?
Default UI with mouseover macros. Don't need anything fancy when every fight is the same tank-and-spank with different colored particle effects.
VuhdoFrames? Yeah, that takes forever to set up properly.
Never bothered with it. Click on player frame, press heal button, repeat until boss dies or everyone wipes. Same result either way, we run it again next week.
